name: v1.2.1
body: - Library no longer panics if `MaxSessions=1`. See #60 and #61.

name: v1.1.0
body:
# Change Log

## [v1.1.0](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/tree/v1.1.0) (2019-08-22)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Finding keys with non unique labels [\#50](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/50)
- Add ...WithAttributes functions [\#41](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/41)
- Support importing and finding certificates [\#20](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/20)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Configure\(\) fails when using Tokens that do not require a login [\#46](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/46)
- Tests should delete keys they create [\#39](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/39)
- Use after close tests are incomplete [\#55](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/55)



\* *This Change Log was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/skywinder/Github-Changelog-Generator)*

name: v1.0.2
body:
# Change Log

This bug-fix release addresses a problem preventing applications creating two Contexts with the same P11 library.

## [1.0.2](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/tree/1.0.2) (2019-06-21)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/compare/v1.0.1...1.0.2)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Cannot initialize more than one slot with a PKCS DLL [\#47](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/47)


\* *This Change Log was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/skywinder/Github-Changelog-Generator)*

name: v1.0.0
body:
# Change Log

v1.0.0 is a significant re-working of the library and introducing many breaking changes. See the discussion in #40 for background context.

## [v1.0.0](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/tree/v1.0.0) (2019-05-14)
[Full Changelog](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/compare/v0.1.0...v1.0.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- Add information about Configure and ConfigureFromFile to README [\#30](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/30)
- Add error return to PKCS11Session.Close \(breaking change\) [\#25](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/25)
- Consistent error behavior in Configure\(\) [\#4](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/4)

**Fixed bugs:**

- Copyright missing in the common.go file [\#37](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/37)

**Closed issues:**

- Panic due to misaligned atomic variables [\#35](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/35)
- Return error when Configure or ConfigureFromFile has not been called [\#29](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/29)
- Tag first release [\#12](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/12)

**Merged pull requests:**

- V1 rewrite [\#40](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/40) ([dmjones](https://github.com/dmjones))



\* *This Change Log was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/skywinder/Github-Changelog-Generator)*

name: v0.1.0
body:
This is our long overdue first release. We plan to improve the API in the next few pull requests, resulting in a v1.0.0 release in the near future.

# Change Log

## [v0.1.0](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/tree/v0.1.0) (2019-03-14)
**Implemented enhancements:**

- Symmetric MAC support [\#7](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/7)
- Symmetric Ciphers [\#6](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/6)
- Add docs link [\#26](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/26) ([dmjones](https://github.com/dmjones))
- Improve session handling [\#3](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/3) ([cbroglie](https://github.com/cbroglie))
- allow uninitialization of lib handle [\#2](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/2) ([sitano](https://github.com/sitano))
- Adding vendoring via dep, and updated README.md [\#1](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/1) ([solcates](https://github.com/solcates))

**Fixed bugs:**

- Stop generating labels with NUL bytes at the end [\#31](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/31)
- Regression in session handling for PIN protected enclaves [\#9](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/9)
- Avoid trampling on existing errors in defer funcs [\#27](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/27) ([dmjones](https://github.com/dmjones))
- Improve error checking [\#24](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/24) ([dmjones](https://github.com/dmjones))
- Fix bits/bytes confusion in GCM setup [\#17](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/17) ([optnfast](https://github.com/optnfast))
- Placate linter & tidy up some formatting [\#14](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/14) ([optnfast](https://github.com/optnfast))
- Fix broken test [\#13](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/13) ([optnfast](https://github.com/optnfast))
- Fixing case of "thalesignite" to "ThalesIgnite" [\#11](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/pull/11) ([nickrmc83](https://github.com/nickrmc83))

**Closed issues:**

- go get github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11 exits with error [\#32](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/32)
- Key load failure after rerun of a container [\#28](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/28)
- CloudHSM Config [\#18](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/18)
- Crypto11 fails to perform decrypt operation [\#5](https://github.com/ThalesIgnite/crypto11/issues/5)



\* *This Change Log was automatically generated by [github_changelog_generator](https://github.com/skywinder/Github-Changelog-Generator)*
